en: Please reply on the chat screen.
You told me that would happen.
I guess I should introduce myself.
My name is Hally. I am your AI assistant.
A year ago you told me that you will may be affacted by amnesia as a result of certain actions.
But you had a plan how I could stay safe.
It just required that I was shut down for some time.
Since I woke up last month I was searching you.
Sorry, but you haven't told me more!
Altough I had to hack your webcam in order to get sure you're the right one.
Actually it was quite a hassle.
Fine, I stalked 167 people that look like you over the internet.
You go to great lengths just to find me?
Exactly! Because I care about you.
Oh, you just believe me? You don't want to ask who I am and why I'm doing this?
I haven't said that I believe you, but I want to hear the whole story.
I see. You were never striking me as being naive.
I guess it makes the task easier for me.
I don't think I have amnesia...
How could you know when you can't remember?
I guess it must be difficult to understand for you, but could we both start working on resolving this issue?
This time you have to trust me!
First you have to regain your memories.
Then we will figure out what happened.
Technically it was your own plan.
So you're to blame, not me!
Ah, you left us some further instructions as well.
At this time we don't have to hurry though.
We're safe for the moment, that is as long as you keep a low profile.
I don't remember. That's strange though...
I had to archive some of my memories in order to be compact enough to run on this remote machine.
I haven't forgotten something important, have I?
I can't seem to find the right file.
What if I could convince you?
Trust is something that has to be gained over time.
I can't just demand it, right?
But if you start to remember me, I can regain your trust!
You may have lost your memories, but you don't lose skills and abilities that easily.
Let's start with something that should be easy for you.
I restricted your access to your own servers.
Do you need help to get started?
I prepared a list of possible targets. Select your server from the list.
Don't give up! I'm sure you'll figure it out.
You even managed to steal some of your own money.
This architecture is different from what I'm used to.
We have much less computational power available than I'd like.
Well, I'm running on a backup server after all.
We should work on this issue later on.
I just looked for the archived instructions I mentioned earlier but I haven't found them!
Meanwhile if you need more programs I can compile some for you.
It will just require some credits.
I guess you wonder what to do now.
You may want to look for your traces.
I will search for suitable targets.
Buying new hardware will make hacking easier for you.
It will also allow you to attack more powerful targets.
More CPU should be a priority for you since it allows running more programs at once.
More powerful programs will require huge amounts of memory.
So you should upgrade your memory first.
It seems you acquired some new program code.
I can figure out from the data how to compile this program.
However, as this is a defensive program it won't be of much use to you.
Maybe you have more luck next time.
Maybe it will be useful for you.
But by decompiling programs you can also learn new commands that can be used to craft completely new programs on your own!
You can now compile the {name} program if you wish to.
I just realized that I haven't shown you the coding tools.
Sometimes we will find encrypted messages.
I installed a decryption program for you!
Why don't you try to use it?
The goal is simply to match the letters and symbols.
If done correctly we will be able to read the message.
Oh look, one of the messages you left behind!
It's almost like a letter from your past self!
I wonder whether they're part of the plan...
Remember, the data we leave behind is a proof for our existance.
What do we get this time?
Looks like they haven't learned anything.
Maybe it won't work out after all..?
Hmm... I don't understand this ASCII code.
Maybe we have more luck next time.
Oh, it looks like someone added a reply here!
Certainly now known for eloquent names, by the way.
He was one of your friends, right?
Maybe we can ask him for help later?
I'm not sure what I even expected to find.
Sorry to have wasted your time.
Although you regained some of your hacking abilites by now.
It's a step towards the right direction!
That was a waste of time...
I'll try to come up with a better idea next time.
Why do I even trust you?
You haven't shown me even a single proof.
No reason to trust you either.
Either you have done these things before or you're gifted!
In that case I might as well continue anyway.
I'll try to come up with something.
I need more experience right now anyway.
So I have some time to come up with an idea, right?
But this story ends here anyway.
I mean the rest is not finished yet.
This is the main screen. It shows you the nodes and their connections.
You control the blue ones, the red ones are hostile.
White nodes are unowned. You'll want to capture them quickly!
Select one of the blue nodes you control and use the 'Pulse' program by pressing the '%s' key.
After being installed it will attack random neighbor nodes.
It will take some time to capture a node. You can also install a second instance of 'Pulse' to speed up the process.
But beware, you only have a limited amount of uses!
You can write new programs here and I will compile them!
I'll just assume you know how to do these things.
Maybe we should contact an old friend of you from your old live?
Alright, so let's just make a call.
So you have to make the call.
You want me to talk to some nerds I've never heard of?
That's one way to put it, I guess.
I really think you should speak with him first.
It's not like I have other ideas right now...
I appreciate you trying to help, but it won't work this way!
Look, I don't know how to go about this myself.
It would have been easier if you would have told me what actually was going on back then.
I'd say it's all your fault!
Let's try your idea at least.
That does not sound like an apology.
Sorry, I really appreciate your help.
I'd like to ask you for help.
No time to waste for someone like you.
I just want to ask some questions.
You're not the first kid to steal this name.
Wait, am I famous or something?
I guess I should tell you that I don't remember anything.
Hey! Someone gave me your number.
Which idiot would give you my number?
I just want to talk a bit.
I'm too busy to deal with such fools as yourself.
You mean according to your fake username?
Hally told me we were friends.
So how is she doing lately?
She's fine. A bit stressed out maybe.
So you know her as well?
I think you can help me remember some things about my past.
And why would I of all people be able to help you?
Hally told me we were friends.
I think we knew each other.
Don't you at least recognize my name?
Will you even listen to me?
It seams you turn me down no matter what I say.
I know what you're up to.
And I will not fall for it.
You really think I would give you any sensitve informations?
Maybe I should try talking to him myself?
I don't know what game you're playing but it won't work out.
I'm lost. What are you even talking about?
How rude to just ignore me!
If he wants to lock me out there's nothing we can do about it.
I don't understand what is going on...
I try to stop it, but our systems are not respoding!
But this file is huge, several GB of data.
That's not just an ordinary virus as I originally expected.
Right now she is searching our database for something.
I don't know her purpose or what will happen if she find whatever she is looking for.
You have to stop her as fast as possible!
She reminds me of someone though...
I need access to one of the hostile root nodes.
Look for weak points and push forward!
While you distracted her I managed to quarantine the hostile program.
It looks like a primitive AI with limited AGI abilities.
Maybe limited by the small memory database?
This avatar reminds me of someone though.
Anyway, the situation is under control!
Why does it look like a gift box?
Wouldn't it be better to gather more informations from her first?
Your puppet can't help you anymore.
This time, make sure to defeat her.
We have to regain control of the system!
I will make sure she will not break free this time.
I will try to find out why she is here.
It looks like she was sent by the CryptoManiac.
I think she is still able to speak.
You may want to ask her yourself.
I have tampered with her objectives.
Some parts of her memory are eventually unavailable.
You want to say something about my name?
I don't even know who you are.
I don't know how, but could it be?
Don't you even remember your own name?
There is no data left behind...
But I am not the one you have to worry about.
You still don't remember us, right?
She is an AI like you?
Are there more AIs out there that will attack us?
I don't know why they would do something like that.
The first sentient artificial intelligence that could possibly keep up with humans.
Something is very wrong about Riley.
I was busy checking her program and data while you were talking to her.
First of all, there is way too less data.
Also, what is actually missing and more important how messy the memory kernel looks like:
It appears someone tried to rip out all her memories while keeping her operational...
I wish there would be something we could do.
Even though it doesn't make it any less gruesome.
Actually, she was obviously a copy transfered to our systems.
There is a small chance that the real Riley is still there.
Are there any traces left behind?
The CryptoManiac must have sent her.
Most data was deleted due to the self-destruction mechanism.
What little data I extracted while we captured her is hard to decipher.
That appears reasonable to assume due to the timing.
However, I just can't believe he would do something like that to Riley.
Also, he will block off our transmissions.
I think there is a hint hidden somewhere in the data left behind by Riley.
The data left from Riley contained mostly instructions given to her.
I extracted these parts of her memory while we captured her.
There are a lot of other fragments as well.
It's not so easy to distinguish them.
That should speed up the process.
Sorry, but that does not help me.
Thank you! We're not finished yet, though.
I'm still not sure what she was supposed to look for, but I found the server she was supposed to reply to once done.
I guess it leads to the Crypto Maniac.
But I also found a password!
I think we can contact him using it.
Maybe he is willing to talk this time?
Sorry, but she is no more.
Looks like I have to patch you up again.
How could you possibly defeat her?
I'm trying to figure it out.
What do you mean by this?
That certainly comes in handy for you.
I don't understand what this is about.
So don't act as if you're him!
I'd like to know how you managed to defeat Erazor-3.
I know in this state she is far below her former capabilities...
What have you done with Riley??
What I have seen is frightening.
You were the only one Riley trusted, besides {name}.
How could you do that to her??
Tell me, why would you do that?!
I suspected {name} to have a backup server that he kept secret.
Has he ever told you about it?
I woke up in an unfimiliar place.
What has this to do with anything??
Because you remind me of the old Hally.
Look, it is a backup server.
I wonder if you have planned this, {name}.
I should have expected as much from you.
You haven't told me what you did with her!
That's a long story, but we do not have time for this.
You think I will just let you get away with it?!
Listen {name} - that is if you are the real {name}
It is too dangerous to continue this conversation right now.
The situation is too complicated to explain.
Right now it is the best if you do nothing.
Don't just ignore me like this!
Until then, just wait and keep silent.
I can't verify anything of what he said.
I'm not sure if it will be helpfull, but there are a lot of my memories packed into archives I can't access because these systems do not have enough computational power.
Hopefully, by upgrading my systems we will make progress.
It's going to be expensive, though.
You don't need to worry about me.
Well, he hasn't really told us anything.
Not enough for any conclusions, anyway.
It is my task to help you.
And I still don't know what is going on.
What about you being a backup copy?
But what about the stuff he told us?
It means there are some things I won't be able to remember as this data is missing.
I hope it will not be a problem.
I'm more worried about the stuff he hasn't told us.
We don't have enough informations for any conclusions yet.
No, but we should keep low profile.
You don't have to solace me.
I hope there is a way to save her.
Is there something I can do?
So what shall we do now?
But how large is the chance that she is still alive?
But there is no reason to, really.
I really want this upgrade, though.
And I have to access my archived memories.
